item.description:
We all have either IPads, Smart phones or both. We've been talking about this for awhile. Wx is looking like a bad netar, so lets meet and go over some of what we all know to make flying safer and cheaper.

 

 

Bring your favorite technology tools and do a good run up (in your head) before you get here as I expect lots of good information will be forthcoming from this.

Please RSVP so we can decide if we need food or move location.

Thanks to all who've been pushing for this,

Charley
item.why: Cause we all know something about how this stuff works!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: FPA IPAD Techno Geek Meeting
